steps.title: Draw a rounded rectangular shape with a long rectangle for the finger board.
steps.content: Draw a rounded rectangular shape with a long rectangle for the finger board.

steps.title: Add a curve line on the sides of the rounded rectangle.
steps.content: Add a curve line on the sides of the rounded rectangle. Erase the previous lines and draw a shape like an ice cream cone at the bottom. This will serve as a tailpiece. Add small circles on the edge of the long rectangle above.

steps.title: Make an outline for the sketches.
steps.content: Make an outline for the sketches.

steps.title: Add the scroll on top of the fingerboard, a bridge in the middle of the cello's body and an S shape on each side
steps.content: Add the scroll on top of the fingerboard, a bridge in the middle of the cello's body and an S shape on each side

steps.title: Make small circles at the side of the scroll at the top for tuning pegs.
steps.content: Make small circles at the side of the scroll at the top for tuning pegs. This is where you tune your cello.

steps.title: Color the body a woody shade.
steps.content: Color the body a woody shade. This could be brown or maroon and grey on the fingerboard and tailpiece

steps.title: Add 4 lines from scroll to the tailpiece.
steps.content: Add 4 lines from scroll to the tailpiece. These will be the strings. White lines are best, but black or grey work too.
